label: generic
name: generic
description: This flow step will send generic request

inputs.name: baseUrl
inputs.label: Base URL
inputs.description: The base URL where this endpoint will send request to. Add path variables in Url if required

inputs.name: Headers
inputs.label: headers
inputs.description: These headers will be added to all requests. The headers are comma-separated and have the 'key=value' form, per example: key=ABC123,client=456789

validation.message: The headers are comma-separated and have the 'key=value' form, per example: key=ABC123,client=456789. The field admits valid placeholders too.

inputs.name: Params
inputs.label: params
inputs.description: These headers will be added to all requests. The headers are comma-separated and have the 'key=value' form, per example: key=ABC123,client=456789

validation.message: The params are comma-separated and have the 'key=value' form, per example: key=ABC123,client=456789. The field admits valid placeholders too.

inputs.label: Body
inputs.name: body
inputs.description: This is used to set body request

inputs.label: Required call back
inputs.name: requiredCallBack
inputs.description: If true it will return call back

inputs.label: CallbackData
inputs.name: callbackData
inputs.description: This is used to set callback data

inputs.label: Callbacks
inputs.name: callbacks
inputs.description: This is used to set callbacks
